public static String[] termsForText(String text,
                                    Class analyzerClass)
Returns a list of terms by analysing the given text

Parameters:
text - the text to analyse
analyzerClass - the Analyzer class to use, may be null in which case Lucene's StandardAnalyzer is used
Returns:
a list of text terms

                                    org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer)
Returns a list of terms by analysing the given text

Parameters:
text - the text to analyse
analyzer - the Analyzer instance to use, may be null in which case Lucene's StandardAnalyzer is used
Returns:
a list of text terms

termsForQueryString

public static String[] termsForQueryString(String queryString,
                                           Class analyzerClass)
                                    throws org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException
Returns a list of terms by parsing the given query string - special query characters and words (OR/AND) are not included in the returned list

Parameters:
queryString - the query string to parse
analyzerClass - the Analyzer Class instance to instantiate, may be null in which case Lucene's StandardAnalyzer is used
Returns:
a list of text terms
Throws:
org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException

termsForQueryString

public static String[] termsForQueryString(String queryString,
                                           org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer)
                                    throws org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException
Returns a list of terms by parsing the given query string - special query characters and words (OR/AND) are not included in the returned list

Parameters:
queryString - the query string to parse
analyzer - the Analyzer instance, may be null in which case Lucene's StandardAnalyzer is used
Returns:
a list of text terms
Throws:
org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException - if the query is invalid

realTermsForQueryString

public static org.apache.lucene.index.Term[] realTermsForQueryString(String defaultField,
                                                                     String queryString,
                                                                     Class analyzerClass)
                                                              throws org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException
Returns an array of Terms by parsing the given query string. Since Lucene's query parser is used, special query characters and words (OR / AND) are not included in the returned terms

Parameters:
defaultField - The default term field, cannot be null
queryString - the query string to parse, cannot be null
analyzerClass - the Class of Analyzer, may be null in which case Lucene's StandardAnalyzer is used
Returns:
the Term array (field + term pairs)
Throws:
org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException - if the the query has invalid syntax

realTermsForQueryString

public static org.apache.lucene.index.Term[] realTermsForQueryString(String defaultField,
                                                                     String queryString,
                                                                     org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer)
                                                              throws org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException
Returns an array of Terms by parsing the given query string. Since Lucene's query parser is used, special query characters and words (OR / AND) are not included in the returned terms

Parameters:
defaultField - The default term field, cannot be null
queryString - the query string to parse, cannot be null
analyzer - the Analyzer instance, may be null in which case Lucene's StandardAnalyzer is used
Returns:
the Term array (field + term pairs)
Throws:
org.apache.lucene.queryParser.ParseException - if the the query has invalid syntax

Parameters:

the escaped query

Parameters:

the cleaned query

queryHasSpecialCharacters

public static boolean queryHasSpecialCharacters(String query)
Does the given query string contain special characters, ie, those with special meaning to Lucene's query parser

Parameters:
query - the query
Returns:
true if it contains special characters
